input.repo_snapshot_md: MOVA Skills Lab — MOVA 4.0.0 contract-first monorepo (core/mova, skills/, lab/, docs/, spec/mova-4.1.0-draft as reference).
input.goal_summary: Add a lab mini-workflow manufacturer→export→verifier using env.dpp_passport_read_v1 and env.dpp_export_v1; capture snapshot and refresh SQLite memory.
input.constraints_md: All text in English; lab-level artifacts only; reuse existing envelopes from L2_01/L2_02.
